root.name: blendColor()

example.code: orange = color(204, 102, 0) blue = color(0, 102, 153) orangeblueadd = blendColor(orange, blue, ADD) background(51) noStroke() fill(orange) rect(14, 20, 20, 60) fill(orangeblueadd) rect(40, 20, 20, 60) fill(blue) rect(66, 20, 20, 60)

root.description: Blends two color values together based on the blending mode given as the MODE parameter. The possible modes are described in the reference for the blend() function.

parameter.label: c1
parameter.description: color: the first color to blend

parameter.label: c2
parameter.description: color: the second color to blend

parameter.label: MODE
parameter.description: Either BLEND, ADD, SUBTRACT, DARKEST, LIGHTEST, DIFFERENCE, EXCLUSION, MULTIPLY, SCREEN, OVERLAY, HARD_LIGHT, SOFT_LIGHT, DODGE, or BURN
